content.label: I loved this game on the computer, and as most computer games played on ios, its harder to control. I also finished it in a few hours. Still, its super challenging and I love playing it

title.label: How do you use play mode

content.label: I have beaten the game and i want to know how to use play modes someone please help

Oh. My. GOD! This has to be the most entertaining and fun game I have ever played. The no death mode is so hard but not so hard that I just rage quit. The music is AMAZING!!!!! The game never gets boring. The fact that you can submit levels made by yourself just makes the game more diverse. The shiny trinkets that you have to find gives the game a better challenge. Keep up the awesome work, my friend.

I once got the game, then beat it.  A long time later, I got it again, and beat it.  And I LOVED IT BOTH TIMES I GOT IT!  There is nothing else to say about it.  But, the ending made me want there to be a 2nd game, a sequel.  If there is, I will buy it right away!
ADD CONTROLLER SUPPORT NOW
Great gameplay,Great soundtrack and I only died 161 times on the final challenge so I'm a happy camper I recommend to any and all people

This is an amazing game! I didn't look to it like a platformer, even though that's what it is. This game is WAY to good to just be a platformer. The music in this game though... Just wow! I didn't think it was possible to make music this good for a video game but I was wrong. Magnus PÃ¥lsson is amazing at his work as SoulEye.
This game is one of the over 200 games I have. It has so much you have to do, there's lots of obstacles, and you can play levels by other people. If you don't have this game, get it this instant!
I love this game, I bought it on my 3DS. I currently use  D-Pad had alternate controls and it is a game that is worth your while!

title.label: One of the best platformers evar

content.label: Awesome

This is such an awesome game. The best platformer I have ever played. A few tips: 
1. If you Gould get rid of the slight blur in graphics , and made the graphics all as clean and crisp as the now loading screen, that would make the game so much better. 
2. Add the level editor! 
I am very disappointed that the level editor is not included. I was very excited about making a level! Please add it in an update. I don't mind if it's an in-app purchase. 
3. What is that pointless Game Center icon doing?

Amazing game. One of my favourites!

I played until one am :longest I have ever played 
A game in my life

Not only is this game super fun and addicting it's also challenging I recommend game for any gamers or people who definitely love to play arcade style games it's one of the best games I've ever played no lie seriously it's worth the money best $2.99 I've ever spent

If you like a challenge, like old school Mega Man style (basically impossible) you'll love this game. It's maddeningly frustrating at times to get your timing right but the excellent soundtrack pushes you along if you love 8-bit chiptunes.

Excellent level layout. Don't let the 8-but graphics fool you. This game is clever, fast, and challenging.

title.label: One of the best games on the App Store

content.label: It's simple, it's weird, but it's incredibly difficult and very exciting!  A unique puzzle/adventure game with old school/retro graphics, music, and story.  It will take you a long time to beat, and it will be addicting the whole way!

Obtained all trinkets.
Rescued all crew members.
Completed time trials 'A'
ViniVidiVici Beaten.
Still not boring.
11/10 Would die on ViniVidiVici once more.

title.label: One of the best iPhone games out there

content.label: This is one of the best game I have bought from the AppStore and I recommend this to anybody
Fun, intriguing, and, at times, frustratingly difficult. I'm in love with the graphics, gameplay, and story.
Super difficult!! By the way, what's the crying elephant near the tower for?
This game looks like it is well made overall, but the controls are absolutely terrible and make gameplay too frustrating to enjoy. Thumbs down.
Possibly the best game I've ever played on my iPhone. Great game mechanics, devilish obstacles, and fun music. Great job, developers!!!

Loads of fun. Merciless at times. Fun retro feel with graphics and gameplay. The "world" map is a bit tedious. Game itself seems to drag on unnecessarily long. And the controls, at times, make the game annoying. At certain jumps it requires a level of precision that isn't there on the mobile devices.

Low four/high three in the stars
My only complaint is that there doesn't seem to be a sequel. I want more!! I've played through 2 times and tried to get every trinket. I'm addicted and I want to do a sequel!! :) 5 stars

The game is an really challenging, precision controls, patience testing awesome platformer game with a twist.. The ability to flip your gravity. Adding this mechanic into the game adds for challenges. 

The retro visuals and awesome music makes this game so lovable. I would like to thank the surprising amount of devs who made this game. 

It brings back the old school, unforgiving, very challenging gameplay and mechanics and controls. I tend to prefer the D-pad but that is subjective because all work very well. 

This is easily one of the best mobile games on the market if your looking for a challenging reto platformer game.
Really awesome game but I would say it doesn't have enough content for a 3$ app. I finished the game within 3 days and wished that there was a bigger world with more puzzles to solve.
The controls are far too sluggish  for the fine movements this game requires. Waste of money.
A whole bunch of people hate this game,I suggest you put it down before I do

Beautifully simple game mechanic, with visually pleasing graphics and hilarious in-game commentary (look at each room name), this is a fantastic game. One of the few platformers I've actually played to completion on my phone. Music is addictive as hell, too.
This app is so cool and I love playing it but you can't turn off the music, I really would love to play my own music while playing this game. Tons of fun nonetheless, though!
Very challenging! Love it!
WEM9XTYLWR66

VVVVVV is a fun and addicting game and it caught my eye as soon as I saw it. The soundtrack has an awesome retro feel to it. Just beating the game in normal mode was kind of hard. But flip mode was easier.
I have completed everything but Golden Spiral. Is "watch it bend" possible to beat on my iPhone? I can't pass it!

This game is amazing! It's really, really challenging but the puzzles are so cleverly designed. My only complaint is the sloppy controls on iOS. Your guy slips and slides and gets himself killed all over the place, which gets REALLY frustrating since the puzzles require such precision. A lot of the user-created bonus levels are much easier to play, though.
I bought this game and it is really bad. It cost 3 dollars and is always the same. It is so boring.
An amazingly fun game that is worth every penny. What are you waiting for? BUY IT NOW!

title.label: This app is greatâ€¦if you like staring at a black screen

content.label: I downloaded this game and when I open it it says "now loading" then goes to a black screen. I have tried reinstalling it but it still doesn't work. Do not get this until they fix it.
Really did not love this game. I've played similar games that were 100x better.

I got a game card at Starbucks for this game, it looked good so I got it. I soon found that this game is pretty much awesome. This is the first game of this type that I got and it makes me want to get more. This game is definitely a must get, even if it costs three dollars or some really big price for an app.

title.label: Great game but controls need and update.

content.label: All controls make me fail all jumps. Still, a very fun, addicting, and colorful game!

This game could be fun if it wasn't for the almost completely unusable controls. It's obvious they didn't even know themselves what they wanted to do since they provide three different control styles, none of which actually work. 

Love the retro style but you've got to go back to the drawing board on this one folks.
This game is great! Btw it took me about 3 hours to beat the whole game! This game is great! Super addictive.

This was such an amazing game. I finished it in 2 hours, 9 minutes, and 45 seconds, and loved every second of it. There were times when my iPad was in inevitable danger of being thrown across the room, but it stayed in my hands as I felt immense satisfaction at completing the harder rooms. Good job and make more. I mean please make more.

Finished the game. It wasn't impossible but it definitely was harder than any game I've played on the app store. 

Words can't describe how time consuming this was... But looking back on it, I love this game!! Worth trying out... I dare you!
This is an awesome game, full of brain challengers and speed tests. Besides the tuns of colors changing to 'trick your eyes' it a fun game till the very end.
Oh my god you MUST get this!!! The music is great, and the game play is astounding! You HAVE to get this!!!!!!
I got this from Starbucks for free ur it is a great game I beat in one week and by the way this is NOT impossible you should get this game it is great. Another good puzzler is MAMBC try that.
This game had me constantly thinking. I got this game for free at star bucks but it's definitely worth the $3. The story is great and the player levels are great. I hope this helped.

title.label: Fun, but please let me turn off the music

content.label: A really inventive retro game, but the music is unbearably repetitive and cannot be silenced. It is driving me bananas. Please add a control for it. Please.
This game is going to drive me to homicide.
